name: Bella's Bombastic Feast
description:
NOTE: Contains belly expansion fetish content.

Also contains optional cartoony popping, which can be toggled on the warning screen (she'll be fine). Regardless, the game ends when the plate falls away.

This mini-game was commissioned by MopMan, and it features art assets he provided of his OC: Bella the Bomb Genie! She grants wishes in exchange for food and will eat anything, including bombs. You can find more artwork of her and the shenanigans she gets into at: https://twitter.com/mop_man_arts

Controls:
R to restart
Left click and hold to drag the food and bombs that fall onto the plate.
Left click her belly to bounce it.

HTML version coming soon!
